DOC.brief_summary: To overcome the obstacles of endoscopic surgery, the da vinci surgical robot system was applied to the various surgery area . And the complete understanding and practice of the robotic system is very important condition for successful robotic surgery. Investigator developed a home made robotic surgery simulator for novice robotic surgeons. And investigator want to study about the ability of home made robotic surgery simulator versus existing robotic simulation system.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Educational Effect of Home-made Robotic Surgery Simulator for Novice Robotic Surgeons
DOC.criteria: 1. medical student of Yonsei University College of Medicine 2. first time of robotic surgery system 3. voluntary participation of this study 1. minors & foreigner 2. involuntary participation of this study 3. refuse to sign a consent form
